workflow.name: 0033 - SNA - Block External Threats With Umbrella
workflow.title: 0033 - SNA - Block External Threats With Umbrella

properties.name: Webex Access Token
properties.description: The access token to use to authenticate to the Webex API. Information about using a bot, which is what we recommend, can be found here: https://developer.webex.com/docs/bots

properties.name: Top Host Count
properties.description: How many hosts to fetch from Secure Network Analytics

properties.name: Umbrella Organization ID
properties.description: Your Umbrella organization ID. This can be found in the URL of your Umbrella dashboard. For example, in this URL the organization ID is "1234567": https://dashboard.umbrella.com/o/1234567/#/overview

properties.name: SNA Password
properties.description: Password for the Secure Network Analytics API

properties.name: Umbrella IP Destination List
properties.description: Name of the web destination list to add IP addresses to

properties.name: List of Blocked Items
properties.description: This variable is used to keep track of items that were blocked successfully. It will be populated automatically

properties.name: List of Not Blocked Items
properties.description: This variable is used to keep track of items that were not blocked. It will be populated automatically

properties.name: SNA Tenant Name
properties.description: The name of the Secure Network Analytics tenant you want to operate in

properties.name: SNA Username
properties.description: Username for the Secure Network Analytics API

properties.name: Umbrella Domain Destination List
properties.description: Name of the DNS destination list to add domains to

properties.name: Webex Room Name
properties.description: The name of the Webex room to post messages to. If using a bot, make sure to invite your bot to the room before attempting to send messages. If you don't want to use Webex, leave this blank

This workflow fetches top attacking external hosts from Cisco Secure Network Analytics (SNA) for the past 24 hours. Each IP address and domain name is added to a destination list in Umbrella (depending on workflow configuration). Finally, a Webex message is sent with a summary.

Note: This workflow will only fetch the first 10 external hosts. If you want to fetch more, update the Top Host Count local variable.

Documentation: https://ciscosecurity.github.io/sxo-05-security-workflows/workflows/0033

Target Group: Default TargetGroup

Targets: Secure Network Analytics, Umbrella Management, Webex Teams
